remarks: Deduce that an operation is a functor of categories.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
isfunc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` D ) $.
isfunc.c $e |- C = ( Base ` E ) $.
isfunc.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` D ) $.
isfunc.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` E ) $.
isfunc.1 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` D ) $.
isfunc.i $e |- I = ( Id ` E ) $.
isfunc.x $e |- .x. = ( comp ` D ) $.
isfunc.o $e |- O = ( comp ` E ) $.
isfunc.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
isfunc.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. Cat ) $.
isfuncd.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : B --> C ) $.
isfuncd.2 $e |- ( ph -> G Fn ( B X. B ) ) $.
isfuncd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x G y ) : ( x H y ) --> ( ( F ` x ) J ( F ` y ) ) ) $.
isfuncd.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( ( x G x ) ` ( .1. ` x ) ) = ( I ` ( F ` x ) ) ) $.
isfuncd.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B /\ z e. B ) /\ ( m e. ( x H y ) /\ n e. ( y H z ) ) ) -> ( ( x G z ) ` ( n ( <. x , y >. .x. z ) m ) ) = ( ( ( y G z ) ` n ) ( <. ( F ` x ) , ( F ` y ) >. O ( F ` z ) ) ( ( x G y ) ` m ) ) ) $.
isfuncd $p |- ( ph -> F ( D Func E ) G ) $.
$d B m n x y z $.
$d D m n x y z $.
$d E m n x y z $.
$d F m n x y z $.
$d G m n x y z $.
$d H m n x y z $.
$d J x y z $.
$d m n ph x y z $.
